text: Leonidas Pelekanakis (2 November 1962 - 14 January 2021) was a Greek sailor. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics, the 2000 Summer Olympics, and the 2004 Summer Olympics. He was born in Athens, Greece. Pelekanakis died of COVID-19 on 14 January 2021 in Athens, aged 58. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sailors Category:Olympians for Greece Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Athens Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: Leonidas Pelekanakis
